Program_Title: Rep. Martha Roby (R-AL) Speaks in Favor of the No Taxpayer Funding for Abortion Act

Headlines: Freshman Rep. Martha Roby (R-AL) eloquently speaks of judicial activism and the way it has underminded the constitutional rights of unborn Americans. Rep. Roby epitomizes the beliefs of the new freshmen pro-lifers elected to Congress. She will be a pro-life leader in Congress for years to come.
